title: UK Robotics Challenge
description: First UK Robotics Challenge Winner & 2nd in Global League; designed & coded an autonomous robot.

title: OnSecurity, Bristol
description: Worked alongside cybersecurity professional Calum Boal, gaining hands-on experience in penetration testing. Developed practical skills using BurpSuite, analyzing real-world vulnerabilities, and understanding exploit techniques.

title: SGS Berkeley Green UTC
description: A Level Computer Science and a Double Diploma in Cyber Security. PaloAlto CyberSecurity - Foundation Certificate (Full Marks). Personal Research Project in Mass Surveillance.

title: Pentest People, Leeds
description: Completed a one-week penetration testing placement, gaining exposure to infrastructure, web, and mobile application security assessments. Learned industry-standard methodologies, vulnerability identification, and ethical hacking techniques.
